'''Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Barbeque Ribs]] with [[Wriothesley]]. The [[recipe]] for Barbeque Ribs is obtainable from [[Wolsey]] at [[Coupon Cafeteria]] for 75 [[Credit Coupons]].

Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs restores '''30%''' of Max HP and an additional '''1,750''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
